entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:37 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
